statements: SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE survey_response = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM player_feedback ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id > 100 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, survey_response FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 5 AND survey_response IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, survey_response FROM player_feedback WHERE survey_response = 'Positive' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, date_recorded, player_id FROM player_feedback;
SELECT player_id, date_recorded, feedback_text FROM player_feedback ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;

SELECT respondent_id, survey_score, feedback_text FROM survey_responses ORDER BY survey_score DESC, date_recorded ASC;

SELECT player_name, question_text FROM player_info CROSS JOIN survey_questions;
